summary: An ordinance amending Section 1 of Ordinance No. 38613, entitled: "An ordinance providing for the improvement of East fifty-sixth Street, from First Avenue Northeast to Latona Avenue; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 69964, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing the payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", approved July 24, 1918.
